attributes.title: USELESS
attributes.review: Takes forever to load! I got this app to stay updated on events and it’s not up to date. What’s the point of this

attributes.title: This app hurt me
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support trump right? Then I woke up the next day and checked the app and it stabbed me in the chest I am now in the er trying to survive this fatal stab wound and I am suffering pls help it hurts so bad

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app was horrible, it promoted some Cheeto dust with hair, I would give this app zero starts if I could, I would definitely not recommend this app to anyone!!!!!!!!!✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: I’m writing this review on my laptop and let me just say this app gave me a virus on my phone! I just wanted to follow the trump administration but then my phone proceeded to blow up. DO NOT RECOMMEND!

attributes.title: Completely useless
attributes.review: I hate this app it made my phone start glitching and not working properly

attributes.title: this app gave me night terrors
attributes.review: Whatever you do, DONT 🙅‍♀️🤧😡 get this app!!!! Right upon opening it, a wrinkly orange man will jump scare you and will appear in your nightmares 😡if you do not wish to be haunted by a malicious orange,,,, 🧚🏼‍♀️DO NOT DOWNLOAD🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: Help
attributes.review: I was using this app then it shut me out and told me that that’s not what trump said we’re taking it out of context then my dog got cancer and the mib smashed through the window and Called me a c*nt

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: Every time I tried to open this app my fingers were burned off at the tips. Would not recommend such a vile disgusting piece of trash.

attributes.title: So glitchy
attributes.review: Here I am trying to support our one and only true president but every time I get in the app it spits me back out!! Very disappointed

attributes.title: Absolute Trash
attributes.review: I got this app and I have to say it was severely disappointing. When I first opened it my eyes fell out of my head because of the sheer ugliness of the Cheeto boy on my screen. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANYONE. just sayin.
